params.script:
import dataiku

# define a list
year_list=[1,2,3]
associated_emails={1:['ehfiuzehf'],2:["dyazveydvzj"],3:["izbfzib"]}
associated_emails={1:['ehfiuzehf'],2:["dyazveydvzj"]}

if set(year_list)!=set(associated_emails.keys()):
    raise Exception("The email list is not complete - the scenario cannot run - please fix the issue")

# get project handle
projecthandle=dataiku.api_client().get_project(dataiku.default_project_key())

for year in year_list:
    
    # UPDATE THE VARIABLE

    # get variables
    my_vars=projecthandle.get_variables()
    
    
    # update variable value
    my_vars["standard"]["selected_year"]=year

    # update project variables
    projecthandle.set_variables(my_vars)
    
    
    # RUN THE SCENARIO
    scenario = projecthandle.get_scenario("Build_a_state_dashboard_and_send_it")
    scenario.run_and_wait()
